Subject: Schedule Meeting for "Netwrix Support Ticket #00439873"

TextBody:
Hello Team,

We've scheduled a remote session for today at 5:30 PM IST.

Conference Instructions
Click the link below to join the conference at the specified date and time:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/84944169671?pwd=LkM3gQmKjxalesL7TF6yOmHQ8luVaj.1
Dial-in Info
+1 253 205 0468 
Additional numbers may be available upon entering the conference.  Additional Numbers

Meeting Number
84944169671

Password
972926
As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualization environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).

This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.

Without having a snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.

Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:

-Putty

-Zoom


Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption

TextBody:
Hello Prasanth,

Thank you for allowing us to assist you today.

To recap what we've done:

1. You created a snapshot of the EPP appliance in your virtual environment.
2. Allowed the port 62828 for SSH connectivity.
3.We connected from our side through Putty and changed the password.

Can you confirm that you could access the console properly afterwards?


Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

Hello Prasanth,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00439873. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

one of our EPP customer entered wrong password 5 times, after that they are identified forgot the password.

Regards,
Prasanth
